𝗘𝗔𝗦𝗬𝗡𝗢𝗧𝗘𝗦 | Creating and synchronizing notes across multiple devices (Windows, Android, iOS) using P2P or web server synchronization.  📈 Growing!

◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 💻 Pascal 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Creating and synchronizing notes across multiple devices (Windows, Android, iOS) using P2P or web server synchronization.
📅 Created: Oct 2016 • Updated: Aug 2025

◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Cross-platform note application (Windows, Android, iOS)
✅ P2P synchronization
✅ Web server synchronization
✅ Multi-language support (English, Russian, Chinese, Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Japanese, Arabic, Italian, Korean, Turkish)
✅ Dark theme with automatic switching
✅ Tablet support


◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐ 57 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 11 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 4 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

EasyNotes is a cross-platform note application that supports Windows, Android, and iOS. It offers P2P and web server synchronization, allowing users to keep their notes consistent across devices. The application supports multiple languages and includes features like a dark theme and tablet optimization.

◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/r57zone/EasyNotes

𝗖𝗨𝗥𝗟𝗦𝗔𝗣𝗣 | Privacy-first iOS workout logging app.  

⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🍎 Swift 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Privacy-first iOS workout logging app.
📅 Created: Aug 2025 • Updated: Aug 2025

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Workout Logging
✅ Exercise Database (800+ exercises)
✅ Custom Exercises
✅ Workout History & Analytics
✅ Template System
✅ Privacy-focused (100% Offline, Local Storage Only, No Analytics, No Accounts)


⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐ 2 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 0 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 3 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Curls App is a privacy-focused iOS application for logging workouts. It features a comprehensive exercise database, custom exercise creation, workout history and analytics, and a template system for reusable routines. The app prioritizes user privacy by operating entirely offline, storing data locally, and avoiding analytics or account requirements.

⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆

𝗟𝗜𝗬𝗜𝗡𝗚 | Automating ID photo post-processing for photo studios.  🔥 Super Hot!

╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🐍 Python 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Automating ID photo post-processing for photo studios.
📅 Created: Aug 2024 • Updated: Aug 2025

╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Automatic human/face recognition
✅ Automatic angle correction
✅ Automatic background replacement
✅ Automatic ID photo cropping to various sizes
✅ Automatic photo layout/arrangement


╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 2.7K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 224 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 2 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

LiYing is a Python program designed to automate the post-processing workflow for ID photos, typically used in photo studios. It features automatic human and face recognition, angle correction, background replacement, ID photo cropping to various sizes, and automatic photo layout. The program can be run offline, with all image processing done locally.

╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍

• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/aoguai/LiYing

𝗕𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗢 | Quickly capturing and organizing fleeting thoughts and ideas in a private, self-hosted environment.  🔥 Super Hot!

⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 📘 TypeScript 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Quickly capturing and organizing fleeting thoughts and ideas in a private, self-hosted environment.
📅 Created: Oct 2024 • Updated: Aug 2025

⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ AI-Enhanced Note Retrieval using RAG
✅ Self-hosted data for privacy
✅ Efficient and Fast note capture with Markdown support
✅ Lightweight architecture with multi-platform support (Tauri)
✅ Open for Collaboration


⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 5.6K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 407 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 170 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Blinko is an open-source, self-hosted personal AI note tool that prioritizes privacy. It allows users to quickly capture and organize their thoughts with AI-enhanced retrieval using RAG, ensuring efficient access to information while maintaining complete control over their data. Blinko supports Markdown and offers multi-platform support via Tauri.

⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko

𝗠𝗖𝗣 | Providing tools to scrape, extract structured data, and crawl webpages, along with access to browser agents.  🔥 Super Hot!

◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 📘 TypeScript 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Providing tools to scrape, extract structured data, and crawl webpages, along with access to browser agents.
📅 Created: Feb 2025 • Updated: Aug 2025

◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Scraping webpages
✅ Crawling webpages
✅ Extracting structured data
✅ Searching with Bing
✅ Browser automation with Browser Use agent
✅ Browser automation with OpenAI's CUA model
✅ Browser automation with Anthropic's Claude Computer Use
✅ Profile creation, deletion, and listing


◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐ 576 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 47 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 2 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

The Hyperbrowser MCP Server provides tools for scraping, crawling, and extracting structured data from web pages. It also offers access to general-purpose browser agents like OpenAI's CUA, Anthropic's Claude Computer Use, and Browser Use. The server supports profile management for persistent configurations.

◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
